## IJsonConverterOptions.onInvalidPropertyName property

If [onInvalidPropertyName](./ts-json.ijsonconverteroptions.oninvalidpropertyname.md) is `'error'` (default) then any property name that is invalid after template rendering causes an error and stops conversion. If [onInvalidPropertyName](./ts-json.ijsonconverteroptions.oninvalidpropertyname.md) is `'ignore'`<!-- -->, then names which are invalid after template rendering are passed through unchanged.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onInvalidPropertyName: 'error' | 'ignore';
```
